cast.name: 尼古拉斯·沙普泰拉 Nicholas Saputra
阿曼达·罗尔斯 Amanda Rawles

introduction: Screen, a popular film star who is bored with his career and wants to make a musical theater set in a family history that is always related to Indonesian film history. The screen is in the process of creating works, making it imaginable in the form of various characters, from great-grandfathers, grandfathers, to fathers. The entire story is told through diary-based narratives, love letters, photographs, documentaries, artifacts and songs that bring Layar to various eras of Indonesian film history in a musical atmosphere.
